actions.text: Referred to Senate Committee on Veterans' Affairs.

official_title: A bill to authorize the payment for 1-year period of a variable allowance to assist in the recruitment and retention of certain physicians in the Department of Medicine and Surgery of the Veterans' Administration.

summary.text: Authorizes the Administrator of the Veterans' Administration to pay physicians in the Department of Medicine and Surgery a variable allowance (not to exceed $13,500 annually) in order to attract and retain the services of highly qualified physicians.

titles.title: A bill to authorize the payment for 1-year period of a variable allowance to assist in the recruitment and retention of certain physicians in the Department of Medicine and Surgery of the Veterans' Administration.
